XXavsata_u:5: somo vaḍikaḥ padmāṅkaḥ pañcālo dhūpa eva ca /

XXavsata_u:10_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:10_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:11: tatra bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhabodher yaśasā ca sarvaloka āpūrṇaḥ //
XXavsata_u:12: atha dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:13: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalas tyāgaruciḥ pradānaruciḥ pradānābhirato mahati tyāgo vartate //
XXavsata_u:14: yāvad asau sarvapāṣaṇḍikaṃ yajñam ārabdho yaṣṭum*,
XXavsata_u:16: yadā bhagavatā rājā bimbisāraḥ saparivāro vinītaḥ,
XXavsata_u:17: tasya ca vinayād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vinayam upagatāni,
XXavsata_u:18: tadā rājagṛhāt pūrṇasya jñātayo 'bhyāgatya pūrṇasya purastād buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣayituṃ pravṛttā dharmasya saṃghasya ca /
XXavsata_u:19: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavato guṇasaṃkīrtanaṃ pratiśrutya mahāntaṃ prasādaṃ pratilabdhavān* /
XXavsata_u:20: tataḥ śaraṇam abhiruhya rājagṛhābhimukhaḥ sthitvā ubhau jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣipan*,
XXavsata_u:21: dhūpam udakaṃ ca bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttaḥ:
XXavsata_u:22: āgacchatu bhagavān yajñaṃ me anubhavituṃ yajñavāṭam iti /
XXavsata_u:23: atha tāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari bhagavataḥ puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṣiptvā tasthuḥ dhūpo 'bhrakūṭavad udakaṃ vaiḍūryaśalākavat //
XXavsata_u:25: kuta idaṃ bhadanta nimantraṇam āyātam iti /
XXavsata_u:27: dakṣiṇāgiriṣv ānanda janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
XXavsata_u:31: bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛtto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade cārikāṃ caritvā pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya yajñavāṭasamīpe sthitvā cintām āpede:
XXavsata_u:33: atha bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣusahasram antardhāpya ekaḥ pātracarakavyagrahastaḥ pūrṇasmīpe sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:34_0: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavantaṃ dadarśa dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:35: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritaṃ bhagavataḥ samīpam upasaṃkramya bhagavantam uvāca:
XXavsata_u:40: yadi te parityaktaṃ dīyatām asmin pātra iti /
XXavsata_u:41: atha pūrṇo brāhmamahāśālaḥ pañcamāṇavakaśataparivṛto bhagavato vividhabhakṣyabhojyakhādyalehyapeyacoṣyādibhir āhārair ārabdhaḥ pātraṃ paripūrayitum* /
XXavsata_u:42: bhagavān api svakāt pātrād bhikṣupātreṣv āhāraṃ saṃkramayati /
XXavsata_u:43: yadā bhagavato viditaṃ pūrṇāni bhikṣusahasrasya pātrāṇīti,
XXavsata_u:48: tataḥ prātihāryadarśanāt pūrṇaḥ prasādajāto mūlanikṛtta iva drumo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:49: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā,
XXavsata_u:53: atha bhagavān pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:54: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:56_0: yā adhastād gacchanti tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ
XXavsata_u:56_1: pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ
XXavsata_u:56_2: narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,

XXavsata_u:63: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,

XXavsata_u:73_1: apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān
XXavsata_u:73_2: bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ

XXavsata_u:134: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ,

XXavsata_u:138: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

XXavsata_u:142: atha pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghpuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
XXavsata_u:143: sāvadānīṃ vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /

XXavsata_u:152: kuryād anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānam iti viditvoktavān*:
XXavsata_u:154: tvam apy evaṃvidhā bhaviṣyasi yādṛśo bhagavān iti //
XXavsata_u:155: [Speyer 9] tataḥ siṃhena senāpatinā yaśomatyāḥ prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ratnāni ca dattāni /
XXavsata_u:156: tato yaśomatyā dārikayā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:159_0: atha yaśomatī dārikā suvarṇamayāni puṣpāṇi kārayitvā rūpyamayāṇi ratnamayāni prabhūtagandhamālyavilepanasaṃgrahaṃ
XXavsata_u:159_1: kṛtvā śatarasam āhāraṃ sajjīkṛtya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
XXavsata_u:161: sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti /
XXavsata_u:162: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:163: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:164: atha yaśomatī dārikā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śatarasenāhāreṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya puṣpāṇi bhagavati kṣeptum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:165: atha tāni puṣpāṇi upari bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapa ivāvasthitam*,
XXavsata_u:166: yan na na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*,
XXavsata_u:167: yathāpi tad buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devānubhāvena //

XXavsata_u:257_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:257_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:259: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:261: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:262: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:263: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:266: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:269: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:272: ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:273: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:278: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:279: tathā hy asau śramaṇabrāhmaṇanaimittikasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavavipralabdho 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:280: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:281: sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubandhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:283: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:293: saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:294: saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:298: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:301: pūrvakāyam atyunnamayya *{abhyunnamayya}* dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:308: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā kṛtyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
XXavsata_u:309: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:311_0: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
XXavsata_u:311_2: āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ
XXavsata_u:312: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:313: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:317: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:321: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya nanda iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:323: nando dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:324: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:326: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ paṃcavarṣaḥ ṣaḍvarṣo vā,
XXavsata_u:331: so 'pi me kadācit karhicid devatārādhanayā putro jātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:335: yo nāma svasthaśarīro bhūtvā paśur iva saṃtiṣṭhatīti //
XXavsata_u:337: tena ṣaṭ tīrthikāḥ śāstāraḥ svagṛham āhūtāḥ:
XXavsata_u:338: api nāma ayaṃ dārakas teṣāṃ darśanād gauravajātaḥ śayanāsanād api tāvad uttiṣṭhet* /
XXavsata_u:339: atha kusīdo dārakas tāṃś chāstṝn dṛṣṭvā cakṣuḥsaṃprekṣaṇām api na kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:340: kaḥ punar vāda utthāsyati vā abhivādayiṣyati vā,
XXavsata_u:342: atha sa gṛhapatis tām evāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:343: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /

XXavsata_u:346_1: trī rātres trir divasasya ca buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:

XXavsata_u:362: sa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:363: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti /
XXavsata_u:364: tato bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtas tad gṛhaṃ praviveśa /
XXavsata_u:365_0: dadarśa kusīdo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣulakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītyā
XXavsata_u:366: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paraṃ prasādam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:367: sahasā svayam evotthāya bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñapayati /
XXavsata_u:371: athāsya mātāpitarāv antarjanaś cādṛṣṭapūrvaprabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ vismayam āpannāḥ //
XXavsata_u:372: tataḥ kusīdo dārako harṣavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:381: mahān batāyaṃ vīryārambhe viśeṣo yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vīryam ārabheyeti /
XXavsata_u:382: sa śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāv avaghoṣaṇaṃ sārthavāham ātmānam udghoṣya ṣaḍvārān mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:383: tataḥ siddhayānapātreṇa mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān antarniveśane saśrāvakasaṃgho bhojitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:385: atha bhagavān kusīdasya dārakasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /

XXavsata_u:397: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,

XXavsata_u:403_1: brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān
XXavsata_u:403_2: apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān
XXavsata_u:403_3: sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:406: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //

XXavsata_u:468: śrāvastyām anyatamo mahāsārthavāho mahāsamudrād bhagnayānapātra āgataḥ /

XXavsata_u:475: yanv aham idānīm asya nāmnā punar api mahāsamudram avatareyam* /
XXavsata_u:476: siddhayānapātras tv āgaccheyaṃ ced upārdhena dhanenāsya pūjāṃ kuryām iti //
XXavsata_u:478: sa evaṃ kṛtavyavasāyaḥ punar api mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:479: buddhānubhāvena ca ratnadvīpaṃ saṃprāpya mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā kuśalasvastinā svagṛham anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:480: sa mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya bhāṇḍaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:481: tasya nānāvicitrāṇi ratnāni dṛṣṭvā mahāṃllābha utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:483: mayā īdṛśānāṃ ratnānāṃ śramaṇasya gautamasya upārdhaṃ dātavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:484: yanv aham etāni svasyāḥ patnyā āyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:485: tena kārṣāpaṇadvayena vikrīya bhagavato gandhaṃ dadyām iti /
XXavsata_u:488: atha bahagavāṃs tad rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yena sa dhūpa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya sarvāṃ ca śrāvastīṃ sphuritvā mahadabhrakūṭavad avasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:489: tasya tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasāda utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:491: naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnair nābhyarcayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:492: atha tena sārthavāhena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho 'ntarniveśane bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:494: tatas tāni ratnāni upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya mūrdhni bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapaś cāvasthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:495: yan na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*,
XXavsata_u:496: yathāpi tad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena //
XXavsata_u:497: atha sārthavāho dviguṇajātaprasādas tatpratihāryadarśanān mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:

XXavsata_u:590: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:591: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ gṛhapateḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /

XXavsata_u:596: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:598: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ pañcavarṣo ṣaḍvarṣo vā,
XXavsata_u:599: tadā gurau bhaktiṃ kṛtvā sarvaśāstrāṇi adhītāni /
XXavsata_u:601: tad anantaraṃ tasya vaḍikasya kiṃcit pūrvajanmakṛtakarmavipākena śarīre kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ patitam iti duḥkhī bhūtaś cintāparaḥ sthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:603: yad idaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ mama śarīre jātam* /
XXavsata_u:604_0: tasya pitāpi putrasyedaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahadudvignaḥ putrātyayaśaṅkhayā

XXavsata_u:606: kena hetunā mama putrasya dehe jāta iti /
XXavsata_u:607: tataḥ sa vaidyas tasya rogacihnaṃ dṛṣṭvā cikitsāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /

XXavsata_u:611: yad vaidyenāpi cāsya rogasya cikitsituṃ na śakyate,
XXavsata_u:613: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo 'pi putrasya cintā jātā /
XXavsata_u:615: sa dārako rogī bhūto 'śakyo 'pi vadituṃ kathaṃcit pitaraṃ babhāṣe:

XXavsata_u:1156: atha rājñā ajātaśatruṇā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ,

XXavsata_u:1163: tena śrutaṃ yathā rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhagnaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ,

XXavsata_u:2166: ayaṃ bhadanta gṛhapatir ākāṅkṣati bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitum* /

XXavsata_u:2179: tataḥ sa gṛhapatir divyamānuṣair upakaraṇair bhagavantam upasthāya sarvāṅgeṇa bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇīdhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:

XXavsata_u:3910: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:3917: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
XXavsata_u:3918: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:3920_0: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
XXavsata_u:3920_2: āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ
XXavsata_u:3921: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:3922: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:3923: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3924: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:3930: maitrakanyako dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:3931: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:3935: yadā maitrakanyako mahān saṃvṛtas tadā mātaram uvāca:
XXavsata_u:3937: tataḥ paścād aham api (Speyer: ahaṃ pi )
XXavsata_u:3943: yady aham asmai vakṣyāmi mahāsamudravaṇig āsīd iti,
XXavsata_u:3944: eṣo 'pi kadācin mahāsamudram avatīrṇas tatraiva nidhanam upagacched iti //
XXavsata_u:3946: tataḥ prathame divase catvāraḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:3958: tataḥ prathame divase ṣoḍaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:3962: yāvad dhairaṇyikair īrṣyāprakṛtaiḥ sarvān adhiṣṭhānavyavahārān viditvoktaḥ:
XXavsata_u:3968: amba evam anuśrūyate pitāsmākaṃ mahāsamudravaṇig āsīd iti /
XXavsata_u:3973: kiṃ tu tvaṃ bāla ekaputrakaś ca /
XXavsata_u:3975: sa īrṣyāprakṛtibhir akalyāṇamitrair vipralabdho na nivartate /
XXavsata_u:3976: tatas tena mātur vacanam avacanaṃ kṛtvā vārāṇasyām nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
XXavsata_u:3979: ye yuṣmākam utsahante maitrakanyakena sārthavāhena sārdham aśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudram avatartum*,
XXavsata_u:3981: sa kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ pañcavaṇikśataparivāraḥ śakaṭair bhārair mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānīya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3982: mātā cāsya snehavyākulahṛdayā sāśrusurdinavadanā pādayor lagnā:
XXavsata_u:3983: putraka mā māṃ parityajya mahāsamudram avatareti /
XXavsata_u:3986: ucyamānaḥ kṛtavyavasāyo mātaraṃ pādena śirasy abhihatya sārthasahāyaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3988: mā me putraka asya karmaṇo vipākam anubhavethā iti //
XXavsata_u:3989: yāvad asau grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīpaṭṭanāny avalokayan samudratīram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3990: sa pañcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ bhṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhāraṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3991: yāvad vahantaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayād vayasanam āpāditam* /
XXavsata_u:3992: tato maitrakanyakaḥ phalakam āsādya sthalam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3993: tataḥ sthale cañcūryamāṇo nadūrān nagaraṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāmnā dṛṣṭavān* /
XXavsata_u:4000: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:4002: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*,
XXavsata_u:4007: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati sadāmattaṃ nāma nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:4009: yāvat tasmād apy aṣṭāv apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4013: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:4015: sa tābhiḥ sahānekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*
XXavsata_u:4018: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
XXavsata_u:4021: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati nandanaṃ nāma nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:4023: yāvat tasmād api ṣoḍaśāpsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4027: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:4029: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān* yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4030: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
XXavsata_u:4033: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati brahmottaraṃ nāma prāsādam* /
XXavsata_u:4035: yāvat tasmād api dvātriṃśad apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4039: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:4041: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān* yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4042: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
XXavsata_u:4047: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena yathā gacchan paśyaty ayomayaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:4054: mūrdhni cāsya ayomayaṃ cakraṃ bhramaty ādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ saṃprajvalitam ekajvālībhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:4057: tato maitrakanyakas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān*: bho puruṣa,
XXavsata_u:4061: udāhṛtamātre ca tena puruṣeṇa maitrakanyakasya tat karmābhimukhībhūtam*:
XXavsata_u:4062: aham api mātur apakārīti manye tenaivāhaṃ karmaṇā ihākṛṣṭa iti /
XXavsata_u:4063: atha tasminn antare ākāśāc chabdo nirgataḥ:
XXavsata_u:4066: ity uktamātre tasya puruṣasya mūrdhni cakram antarhitam*,
XXavsata_u:4068: tato duḥkhārtaṃ maitrakanyakam avekṣya sa puruṣo gāthayā pratyabhāṣata:
XXavsata_u:4069: AVŚ_36.1 atikramya ramaṇakaṃ sadāmattaṃ ca nandanam* /
XXavsata_u:4070: brahmottaraṃ ca prāsādaṃ kena tvam ihāgataḥ //
XXavsata_u:4072: AVŚ_36.2 atikramya ramaṇakaṃ sadāmattaṃ ca nandanam* /
XXavsata_u:4074: AVŚ_36.3 dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrāt karma pravartate /
XXavsata_u:4075: tatra prakarṣate karma yatra karma vipacyate //
XXavsata_u:4077: AVŚ_36.4 tena karmavipākena cakraṃ vahati mastake /
XXavsata_u:4081: pādenābhyāhatā mūrdhni tasya te karmaṇaḥ phalam* // iti
XXavsata_u:4083: AVŚ_36.6 kati varṣasahasrāṇi cakraṃ vartsyati mastake /
XXavsata_u:4087: ādīptam āyasaṃ cakraṃ tava mūrdhni bhramiṣyati // iti
XXavsata_u:4093: tato maitrakanyako duḥkhavedanābhibhūtaḥ satvānām antike kāruṇyaṃ janayitvā taṃ puruṣam āha:
XXavsata_u:4094: icchāmy ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa sarvasatvānām arthe idaṃ cakraṃ upari śirasā dhārayitum* /
XXavsata_u:4095: mā kaścid anyo 'py evaṃvidhakarmakārī ihāgacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:4096: ity uktamātre maitrakanyakasya bodhisatvasya tac cakraṃ saptatālamātraṃ mūrdhni udgamyākāśe sthitam* /
XXavsata_u:4097: sa ca kālaṃ kṛtvā tuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ //
XXavsata_u:4099: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena maitrakanyaka āsīt, ahaṃ sa /
XXavsata_u:4100: yan mayā saṃvyavaharatā mātā kārṣāpaṇaiḥ pratipāditā,
XXavsata_u:4101: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu mahānagareṣu mahatsukham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:4103: tasya me karmaṇo phalavipākenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:4106: tad ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye maitrakanyakasya /
XXavsata_u:4107: pṛthagjanasya eṣa eṣa guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya /
XXavsata_u:4110: duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṃvardhakau stanyasya dātārau,
XXavsata_u:4112: ya ekenāṃsena putro mātaraṃ dvitīyena pitaraṃ pūrṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ pariharet*,
XXavsata_u:4113: yad vā asyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpam aśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4115: na iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā /
XXavsata_u:4116: yas tv asāv aśrāddhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati,
XXavsata_u:4127: iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā //
XXavsata_u:4129: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:4133_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:4133_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:4134: śrāvastyāṃ anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:4136: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:4137: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:4138: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:4141: pitā cāsya dhanakṣayam anuprāpto bhogakṣayam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4142: sa ca vistīrṇasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavas taṃ putraṃ kālānukālaṃ jñātisakāśaṃ preṣayati /
XXavsata_u:4143: sa tair jñātibhis tathā lālito yathā teṣu pravṛddhasnehaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:4145_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:4146: sa prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:4148: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāre doṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4149: sa evaṃ pravrajitaḥ san jñātibhiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭo viharati /
XXavsata_u:4150: tato bhagavāṃs taṃ gṛhisaṃsargān nivārya araṇye niyojayate /
XXavsata_u:4152: yāvad bhagavāṃs taṃ trir api gṛhisaṃsargān nivārayati:
XXavsata_u:4154: santi cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni /
XXavsata_u:4159: manovijñeyā dharmāḥ iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṃhitā rañjanīyāḥ kaṇṭakabhūtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4161: yatra sthitasya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vṛddhir bhavati /
XXavsata_u:4162_0: yāvat tena kulaputreṇa bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya araṇyavāsena vasatā yujyamānena
XXavsata_u:4162_1: ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānenedam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
XXavsata_u:4163: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4164: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4165: sa pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya bhagavato 'syātiduṣkarāṇi dṛṣṭvā bhagavantam upasaṃkramya sagauravaḥ stauti mānayati ca //
XXavsata_u:4167: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:4169: yāvad ayaṃ kulaputro bhagavatā yāvat trir api grāmāntān nivārya araṇye niyojitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4172_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
XXavsata_u:4172_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ayaṃ kulaputro yāvan trir api grāmāntān
XXavsata_u:4174_0: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
XXavsata_u:4174_1: ayaṃ kulaputraḥ svajīvitaparityāgena grāmāntān nivārya araṇyavāse niyuktaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4176: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:4177: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasmin girikandare prasravaṇapuṣpaphalakandasaṃpanno ṛṣiḥ prativasati kaṣṭatapāḥ phalamūlāmbubhakṣo 'jinavalkalavāsī agnihotrikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4178: tasya ca ṛṣeḥ śaśo vayasyo mānuṣapralāpī /
XXavsata_u:4185: tataḥ sa ṛṣis tatrāśramapade upabhogaviharān nābhiramate /
XXavsata_u:4187: atha śaśas taṃ tathā pravṛttaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavān*:
XXavsata_u:4192: tataḥ sa ṛṣivacanam upaśrutya jātasaṃtāpo mātāpitṛviyogam iva manyamānaḥ pādayor nipatya tam ṛṣim uvāca:
XXavsata_u:4194: api ca anekadoṣasaṃkulo gṛhavāso 'nekaguṇasaṃpannaś cāraṇyavāsa iti /
XXavsata_u:4195: sa bahv apy ucyamāno na nivartate /
XXavsata_u:4202: yasmād ime tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃcayaparā iti /
XXavsata_u:4204: atha kṛtāhnikam āhārakāle śaśa upasaṃkramya tam ṛṣiṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:4205: kṣamasva mama maharṣe yan mayā ūhāpohavirahitena tiryagyonāv upapannena tava kiṃcid apakṛtaṃ syāt* /
XXavsata_u:4207: tataḥ sa ṛṣir jātasaṃvego bāṣpadurdinamukhaḥ priyaikaputram ivopaguhyovāca (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:4210: śaśa uvāca: maharṣe araṇyapriyatayā madīyena māṃsenāhorātraṃ yāpayiṣyasi / kiṃ ca:
XXavsata_u:4211: AVŚ_37.1 na santi mudgā na tilā na taṇḍulā vane vivṛddhasya śaśasya kecana /
XXavsata_u:4212: śarīram etat tv analābhisaṃskṛtaṃ mamopayojyādya tapovane vasa // iti
XXavsata_u:4214: tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ śaśavacanam upaśrutya jātasaṃvega uvāca:
XXavsata_u:4215: yady evaṃ tava priyatayā kāmam ihaiva jīvitaṃ parityakṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:4218: ūrdhvamukhaś ca gaganatalam abhivīkṣya yācituṃ pravṛttaḥ / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:4219: AVŚ_37.2 araṇye me samāgamya viveke ramate manaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4220: anena satyavākyena māhendraṃ deva varṣa nu //
XXavsata_u:4225: yāvac chakreṇa devendreṇa māhendravarṣaṃ vṛṣṭaṃ yena tadāśramapadaṃ punar api tṛṇagulmauṣadhipuṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ saṃvṛttam* //
XXavsata_u:4226: tatas tena ṛṣiṇā śaśaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya tatra vasatā pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4227: tataḥ sa ṛiṣiḥ śaśam uvāca: bhoḥ śaśa,

XXavsata_u:4814: śreṣṭhinā ca sa pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca /
XXavsata_u:4819: tatas tena gṛhapatinā bhṛtakapuruṣasyājñā dattā āryasyekṣurasaṃ prayaccheti /
XXavsata_u:4820: sa ca gṛhapatiḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena bahir yānāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4821: atha tasya puruṣasya parakīye dravye mātsaryam utpannam*:
XXavsata_u:4824: tena aniṣṭagatitrayaprapātanamreṇa sarvābhimatagatidvayanirākariṣṇunā atyantadūrāpagatenāryadharmebhyaḥ pāpaṃ cittam utpādya sa pratyekabuddha uktaḥ:
XXavsata_u:4828: asamanvāhṛtya arhacchrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartata iti /
XXavsata_u:4829: hīnadīnānukampitayā bhṛtyapuruṣo 'yam asyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti tat pātram upanāmitam* /
XXavsata_u:4830: tato 'sau durācāro nirghṛṇahṛdayas tad gṛhītvā pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gatvā prasrāveṇā pūrayitvā upari ikṣurasenācchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāyānupradadau /
XXavsata_u:4832: bahv anena tapasvinā pāpaṃ kṛtam api /
XXavsata_u:4836: kiṃ manyase maudgalyāyana yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena bhṛtakapuruṣa āsīt',
XXavsata_u:4838: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:4839: idānīm api pretabhūtaḥ prakṛṣṭataraṃ duḥkham anubhavati /
XXavsata_u:4840: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye pretasya /
XXavsata_u:4841: iti hi maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4844: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:4848: āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

XXavsata_u:4852: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ anyatarasmin vṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya /
XXavsata_u:4853: aśrauṣīd āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretyāḥ śabdam ārtasvaraṃ krandantyāḥ,
XXavsata_u:4854: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānāyā bhaktaṃ mārgantyāḥ:
XXavsata_u:4857: tataḥ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanena pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca:
XXavsata_u:4858: kiṃ te pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāny anubhaviṣyasīti /
XXavsata_u:4859: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /

XXavsata_u:4865: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:4866: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /

XXavsata_u:5019: yady aham asmai adya bhojanaṃ pradāsyāmi,
XXavsata_u:5021: tayā ekāntam apasṛtya varcasaḥ pātraṃ pūrayitvā upari bhaktena pracchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāya dattam* /

XXavsata_u:5041_1: pretaśatāni dagdhasthūṇākṛtīni nagnāni svakeśasaṃchannāni parvatopamakukṣīṇi sūcīchidropamamukhāni
XXavsata_u:5041_2: ādīptāni pradīptāni saṃprajvalitāny ekajvālībhūtāny ārtasvaraṃ pralapamānāni duḥkhāṃ
XXavsata_u:5045: athāyuṣmān mahamaudgalyāyanaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:5050: vayaṃ smo bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana rājagṛhe pañca śreṣṭhiśatāny abhūvan* /
XXavsata_u:5052: svayaṃ tāvad asmābhir dānapradānāni na dattāni,
XXavsata_u:5053: pareṣām api dānapradāneṣu dīyamāneṣu vighnāḥ kṛtāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5055: pretopapannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhaikṣyam aṭatha (Speyer: aṭhatha) /
XXavsata_u:5056: ete vayaṃ kālaṃ kṛtvā evaṃvidheṣu preteṣūpapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5057: iti bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana ye 'smākaṃ jñātayo rājagṛhe prativasanti,
XXavsata_u:5058: teṣām asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ nivedya chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayitvā cāsmākaṃ pretayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:5060: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena teṣāṃ jñātigṛhebhyaś cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopamantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5067: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svayam evodyukto bhojanaṃ pratijāgaritum* //
XXavsata_u:5068: atha prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām āhāre sajjīkṛte gaṇḍīdeśakāle saṃprāpte tān pretān na paśyati /
XXavsata_u:5069: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano divyena cakṣuṣā tān pretān samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5076: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ saṃvigno bhagavate nivedayāmāsa: bhagavan,
XXavsata_u:5086: tato gaṇḍyām ākoṭitāyāṃ sarvo bhikṣusaṃghaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5087: pretajñātayo 'nye ca kautūhalyābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ pretadarśanotsukāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5088: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā darśitaṃ yathā pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhuñjānaṃ paśyanti,
XXavsata_u:5090: jñātayo asmad arthe buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayantīti /
XXavsata_u:5091: tato bhagavān pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa dakṣiṇām ādiśati:
XXavsata_u:5092: AVŚ_44.1 ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretān anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:5095: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:5096: yāṃ śrutvā anekair prāṇiśatasahasrair mātsaryamalaṃ prahāya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5097: te ca pretā bhagavati cittam abhiprasādya kālagatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5099: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:5101: paśyanti pretebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5106: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
XXavsata_u:5107_0: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ

XXavsata_u:5158: pretopapannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhaikṣam aṭatheti /

XXavsata_u:5167_1: parvatopamakukṣir ādīptā saṃprajvalitā ekajvālībhūtā ārtasvaraṃ kradantī āyuṣmantam
XXavsata_u:5168: yāvad āyuṣmatā uttareṇa sā pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca:
XXavsata_u:5170: AVŚ_46.1 ahaṃ te jananī snigdhā yayā jāto 'si putraka /
XXavsata_u:5172: AVŚ_46.2 pañcaviṃśati varṣāṇi yataḥ kālagatā hy aham* /

XXavsata_u:5177: AVŚ_46.4 sukhaṃ bhadantasya hi vṛkṣamūlaṃ udakaṃ bhajate śītala bhājanesmim* /

XXavsata_u:5182: pretī āha: na mayā putraka mātsaryābhibhūtayā dānāni dattāni,
XXavsata_u:5185: tad idānīṃ putraka jñātigṛhaṃ gatvā chandanabhikṣaṃ kṛtvā mama nāmnā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojaya,
XXavsata_u:5188: evaṃ pretayoner mama mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:5190: kiṃ tu tvayā buddhānte sthātavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:5193: uttara āha: amba yadā pāpaṃ karoṣi,
XXavsata_u:5198: tata uttareṇa jñātigṛhebhyaś chandanabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5202: te tāṃ pretīṃ vikṛtāśrayāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ saṃvegam upagatāḥ bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsuḥ /
XXavsata_u:5203: tataḥ āyuṣmān uttaro buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya pretyā nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:5204: bhagavāṃś ca pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa svayam eva dakṣiṇādeśanām ādiśati:
XXavsata_u:5205: AVŚ_46.5 ito dānād dhi yat punyaṃ tat pretīm anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:5207: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tasyāḥ pretyā mahataś ca janakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:5218: AVŚ_46.6 adyāpi te tiṣṭhati tac charīraṃ vivṛddhanirmāṃsatvagasthicarmam* /
XXavsata_u:5220: yāvad āyuṣmatā uttareṇa subahu paribhāṣya ekā yamalī labdhā /
XXavsata_u:5222: yena ca bhikṣuṇā saṃghamadhyāt sā yamalī krītā,
XXavsata_u:5225: tatas tena bhikṣuṇā āyuṣmata uttarāya niveditam* /
XXavsata_u:5226: uttareṇa gatvā pretīṃ paribhāṣya punar apy ānīya dattā /
XXavsata_u:5227: evaṃ yāvat trir api tasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśād apahṛtā,
XXavsata_u:5229: bhikṣuṇā ca sā pāṭayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vilepanikāyāṃ
XXavsata_u:5231: sīvitā / tatas tayā na punar apahṛtā /
XXavsata_u:5232: ata eva mātsaryaṃ satvānāṃ viḍambanakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mātsaryaprahāṇāya dhyāyitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:5233: tathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur yathā tasyāḥ pretyā iti //

XXavsata_u:5245: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /

XXavsata_u:5251: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:5252: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:5253: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nandakam idam avocat*:

XXavsata_u:5277_1: samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
XXavsata_u:5277_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /

XXavsata_u:5287: tatas tayā dānapatir gṛhebhyaḥ pravṛttakāni chandakāni # # # [The gap may be filled ou by ācchinnāni; Speyer:
XXavsata_u:5288: kurkuraiḥ śṛgālaiś ca.] śaikṣāśaikṣīṇāṃ ca avarṇo bhāṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5291: kiṃ manyase nandaka yā sā śreṣṭhiduhitā,
XXavsata_u:5295: yat tayā naityakasamucchedaḥ kṛtas tena kākair gṛdhraiḥ kurkuraiś cābhidrutā /
XXavsata_u:5296: yat tayā śaikṣāśaikṣīṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām avarno bhāṣitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5298: yat tayā śīlavato bhikṣūn dṛṣṭvā nayane nimīlite,
XXavsata_u:5300: iti hi nandaka ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5303: tasmāt tarhi te nandaka ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:5306: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe daśabhiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:5325: tato 'sya sabrahmacāribhir muṇḍikāṃ gaṇḍīṃ parāhatya śarīrābhinirhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5326: tato 'sya śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā vihāram āgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5327: tato layanadvāraṃ vimucya pātracīvaraṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5328: yāvat paśyanti taṃ pretaṃ vikṛtakaracaraṇanayanaṃ paramabībhatsāśrayaṃ pātracīvaram avaṣṭabhyāvasthitam* /

XXavsata_u:5339: mā haiva itaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā narakeṣūpapatsyasa iti /

XXavsata_u:5372: rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tādṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhūya putrasnehe saty api kṣutkṣāmatayā putrāṃs tān bhakṣayantīm* /
XXavsata_u:5374: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti /
XXavsata_u:5375: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:5378: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt karmaṇaḥ prativiraṃsyantīti /
XXavsata_u:5380: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:5381: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ
XXavsata_u:5384: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:5385: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nāladam idam avocat*: ehi nālada,
XXavsata_u:5388: nālada āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5389: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:5390: AVŚ_49.1 pañca putrān ahaṃ rātrau divā pañca tathāparān* /
XXavsata_u:5391: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptas tathāpi me // iti
XXavsata_u:5392: AVŚ_49.2 kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
XXavsata_u:5393: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* // iti
XXavsata_u:5399: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:5400: bhūtapūrvaṃ nālada atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām 'nyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:5402: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:5403: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato naiva putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:5404: sa kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:5407: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:5408: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:5409: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5410: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:5411: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:5413: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5414: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:5419: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:5420: tasya devatārādhane 'pi sati na putro na duhitā //
XXavsata_u:5424: tena sadṛśāt kulād dvitīyā bhāryā ānītā /
XXavsata_u:5425: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:5426: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:5430: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
XXavsata_u:5432: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udanayati:
XXavsata_u:5441: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
XXavsata_u:5442: idaṃ tayor yatrayatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:5443_0: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvopariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇair
XXavsata_u:5443_1: uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair
XXavsata_u:5444: hārārdhahāravirājitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharimāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:5445: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya //
XXavsata_u:5446: tatas tasyāḥ pūrvikāyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ prathamapatnyās tāṃ bahumānāl lālitāṃ (Speyer: laḍitaṃ)
XXavsata_u:5455: tayā aniṣṭagatiprapātanamugdhayā visrambham utpādya tathāvidhaṃ garbhaśātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattaṃ yena pītamātreṇaiva tasyās tapasvinyāḥ srasto garbhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5456: tatas tayā dvitīyapatnyā sarvajñātīn saṃnipātya sā prathamā patnī samanuyujyate:
XXavsata_u:5457: tvayā me visrambham utpādya śātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattam*,
XXavsata_u:5459: tato 'sau prathamapatnī jñātimadhye śapathaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā:
XXavsata_u:5460: yadi mayā garbhaśātanaṃ dravyam anupradattaṃ syāt*,
XXavsata_u:5461: ahaṃ pretī bhūtvā jātāñ jātān putrān bhakṣayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:5464: yat tayā īrṣyāprakṛtayā garbhaśātanaṃ dattaṃ tena preteṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:5466: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tān eva bhakṣayati /
XXavsata_u:5467: tasmāt tarhi te nālada vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye tasyāḥ pretyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5470: āttamanā āyuṣmān nālado 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:5473_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:5473_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:5474_0: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyām anyatarasyāṃ nagaraparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni prativasanti
XXavsata_u:5474_1: vāntāśāny ujjhitāśāni kheṭamūtropajīvīni pūyaśoṇitaviṣṭhāhārāṇi ghorāṇi prakṛtiduḥkhitāni ca / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:5480: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:5481: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:5483: tatas tena brāhmaṇena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5485: yo 'yam udarastho dārakas tasyāyaṃ prabhāva iti /
XXavsata_u:5486: yāvad asau navānāṃ māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:5487: dārako jāto durvarṇo durdarśano avakoṭimako 'medhyamrakṣitagātro durgandhaś ca /
XXavsata_u:5488: tathāpy asau snehapāśānubaddhābhyāṃ paramabībhatso 'pi mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ saṃvardhitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5492: tasya bālo jāmbāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā //
XXavsata_u:5493: yāvad asāv itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman pūraṇena kāśyapena dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5498: sa tena pravrājito nagnaḥ paryaṭati satkriyāsu ca vartate /
XXavsata_u:5499: tatas tena paryaṭatā vaiśālīparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni dṛṣṭāni /
XXavsata_u:5500: sa pūrvakarmavipākasaṃbandhāt tāṃ nagaraparikhām avatīrya taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgamya samāgamya saṃmodate,
XXavsata_u:5502: yāvad apareṇa samayena jāmbālo dārakaḥ kvacit prayojanena vyākṣipto vaiśālīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5504_0: dadṛśus te pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:5508: te ūcuḥ: pipāsitāḥ smo bhagavann iti /
XXavsata_u:5509: tato bhagavatā pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo 'ṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya pañca dhārā utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5511: tatas te bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5513: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:5521: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
XXavsata_u:5522_0: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ
XXavsata_u:5522_1: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:5522_2: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvāṃ kūṭāgāraśālāṃ udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ
XXavsata_u:5522_3: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:5525: dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:5526: yāṃ śrutvā pañcabhir devaputraśatair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptam* /
XXavsata_u:5530: sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturā yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ //
XXavsata_u:5531: atha jāmbālo nagaraparikhām āgatas tān pretān nādrākṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:5533: sa ca tān parimārgamāṇaḥ khedam āpanno na ca tān āsādayati //
XXavsata_u:5534: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:5535_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:5535_5: trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:5536: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:5537: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:5544: AVŚ_50.2 apy evātikramed velāṃ sāgaro makarālayaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5545: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:5546: tato bhagavāñ jāmbālasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:5547: yāvad anupūrveṇa piṇḍapātam aṭan vīthīm avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5548: jāmbālaś ca itas tato 'nvāhiṇḍamāno bhagavato 'grataḥ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5549_0: atha dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā
XXavsata_u:5551: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca:
XXavsata_u:5552: yadi bhagavan mādṛśānāṃ satvānām asmin dharmavinaye pravrajyāsti;
XXavsata_u:5554: tato bhagavān mahākaruṇāparigatahṛdayaḥ satvānām āśayānuśayajñas taṃ bhavyarūpaṃ viditvā rajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasāryedam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:5556: ity uktamātre bhagavatā saptāhāvaropitair iva keśair dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpannasyeva bhikṣor īryāpathena pātrakarakavyagrahasto 'vasthitaḥ / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:5558: AVŚ_50.3 ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5559: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena //
XXavsata_u:5561_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:5562: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5563: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5566: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ lūhādhimuktānām*,
XXavsata_u:5568: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:5569: kiṃ bhadanta jāmbālena sthavireṇa karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavatīti /
XXavsata_u:5571: jāmbalenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:5574: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:5578: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:5579: AVŚ_50.4 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:5580: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:5581_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi
XXavsata_u:5581_1: prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
XXavsata_u:5581_2: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:5583: tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyām anyatamena gṛhapatinā vihāraḥ kārito yatra nānādigdeśavāsino bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ ca manyante /
XXavsata_u:5584: tasmiṃś ca vihāre pṛthagjano bhikṣur naivāsikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5587: āgantukān bhikṣūn dṛṣṭvā 'bhiṣajyate kupyati vyāpadyate madguḥ pratitiṣṭhati kopaṃ saṃjanayati /
XXavsata_u:5588: ye tu tasmād vihārād bhikṣavaḥ prakrāmanti,
XXavsata_u:5590: yāvad apareṇa samayena janapadād arhadbhikṣur āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5593: tataḥ prasādajātena śvo bhaktena jentākasnātreṇa copanimantritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
XXavsata_u:5595: yāvad dvitīye divase jentākasnātre pratipādite bhakte sajjīkṛte āvāsiko bhikṣur āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5597: paśyati vihārasvāminam ekaśāṭakanivasitam āgantukasya bhikṣoḥ parikarma kurvāṇam* /
XXavsata_u:5602: varaṃ khalu te bhikṣo amedhyena śarīram upaliptam*,
XXavsata_u:5603: na tu evaṃvidhasya dānapateḥ sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:5605: mā haivāyaṃ tapasvī gāḍhatarasya karmaṇo bhāgī bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:5606: yāvat sāmagrīdeśakāle saṃprāpte naivāsikena bhikṣuṇā śrutam*:
XXavsata_u:5610: kṣamasva ārya yan mayā tvayi paruṣā vāg niścāriteti /
XXavsata_u:5611: tato 'rhaṃs tasya prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5613: tena tasya purastāt tat karma atyayenādeśitaṃ prakāśitam uttānīkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:5614: ca na cānena śakitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* /
XXavsata_u:5619: yat tu mayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ dānapradānāni dattāni saṃghasya copasthānām kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:5620: tasya karmaṇo vipākena anāgatān samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:5621: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayenāvāsiko bhikṣuḥ,
XXavsata_u:5624: asya karmaṇo vipākenānantaṃ saṃsāre duḥkham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:5625: tenaiva ca karmāvaśeṣeṇa etarhi paścime bhave evaṃ durgandhaḥ paramadurgandho 'medhyāvaskarasthānanivāsābhiprāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5626: yat punar anena tatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:5627: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5628: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam * /
XXavsata_u:5636: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

XXavsata_u:5839: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātryāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
XXavsata_u:5841: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5842: api yo 'sāv ekaputro 'sya brāhmaṇasya putro 'lpāyuṣkaḥ kālagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:5843: sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5847: atra cāntare sa brāhmaṇas tam ekaputrakam iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpaṃ kṣāntam apratikūlaṃ śmaśāne nirhṛtyotsaṅge kṛtvā karuṇakaruṇaṃ vilapan* kathayati:
XXavsata_u:5849: jñātayaḥ subahv api śokavinodanaṃ kurvaṇā na śaknuvanty utthāpayitum* /
XXavsata_u:5850: sa kākakuraraśvaśṛgālagṛdhraparivṛtaḥ prakīrṇakeśībhiḥ strībhir anugato mahājanakāyena codvīkṣyamāṇas tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:5851: tato 'sya putro devabhūtaḥ pitaraṃ paridevamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ pituḥ śokavinodanārtham ṛṣiveṣadhāriṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya śmaśānasamīpe pañcatapāvasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5852: atha sa brāhmaṇas tam ṛṣiṃ papraccha:
XXavsata_u:5853: bho maharṣe anena tapasā kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:5855: sauvarṇaś ca me rathaḥ syān nānāratnavicitraḥ,
XXavsata_u:5858: so 'haṃ taṃ ratham abhiruhyemāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍeyeti /
XXavsata_u:5860: AVŚ_52.5 yadi varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ tapiṣyasi nirantaram* /
XXavsata_u:5861: na lapsyase 'pi tat sthānaṃ paramatapasāpi hi //
XXavsata_u:5863: tvaṃ ca punar anena mṛtakuṇapenāśucinā paramadurgandhena śavena kāṣṭhabhūtena kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:5868: AVŚ_52.6 yadi varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ rodiṣyasi nirantaram* /
XXavsata_u:5869: na lapsyase 'pi taṃ putraṃ ruditena hi kiṃ tava //
XXavsata_u:5870: tatas tasya brāhmaṇasya bhūtam ṛṣivacanam avagatya prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5873: tata ṛṣis taṃ veṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā pitaram āha:
XXavsata_u:5874: ahaṃ te sa ekaputrako bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5877: ehi tvaṃ tāta buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha,
XXavsata_u:5878: apy eva tvam api saṃsārasamatikrāmaṃ kuryā iti //
XXavsata_u:5879: atha sa brāhmaṇo mṛtaśarīram apahāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5880: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:5882: yāṃ śrutvā tena brāhmaṇeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:5883: sa labdhodayo labdhalābho bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5884: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:5886: yāvad anena devaputreṇāyaṃ pitā śokaṃ vinodya satyadarśane pratiṣṭhāpita iti /
XXavsata_u:5888: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad anenaitarhi dṛṣṭasatyena pitā paritrātaḥ /

XXavsata_u:5891: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:5892: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ pāradārikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5896: tataḥ putreṇa yāvat trir api rājānaṃ vijñāpya iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5898: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena pāradārika āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:5902: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena pitāputrābhyāṃ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti /

XXavsata_u:6622: āścaryaṃ yan nāma ayaṃ tiryagyonigato bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āsādya deveṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:6624: kathaṃ nāma vayaṃ manuṣyabhūtā viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchemeti?
XXavsata_u:6625: tatas te buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya bhagavato 'ntike pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6626: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* //
XXavsata_u:6627: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:6628: kāni bhadanta mahiṣapūrvikeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena mahiṣeṣūpapannaḥ?
XXavsata_u:6629: ebhiś ca mahiṣīpālaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenāhartvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*?
XXavsata_u:6631: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:6634: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:6638: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:6639: AVŚ_58.7 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /

XXavsata_u:6672: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:6673: atha bhagavān upoṣadhasya devaputrasya āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:6674: yāṃ śrutvā upoṣadhena devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:6676: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:6700: tato bhikṣavaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktā viharanti /
XXavsata_u:6703: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
XXavsata_u:6705: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /

XXavsata_u:6710: kuto bhadanta upoṣadhasya devaputrasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti /

XXavsata_u:6716_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:6717: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:6718: yāvad apareṇa samayena kṛkī rājā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati paryupāsanāya /
XXavsata_u:6719: yāvad dvau brāhmaṇāu ṛṣipatanaṃ gatau kenacit karaṇīyena /
XXavsata_u:6720: tābhyāṃ rājā drṣṭo mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena /
XXavsata_u:6724: kiṃ karma kṛtvā yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti /
XXavsata_u:6727: yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti /
XXavsata_u:6728: tatas tau brāhmaṇau āṣāḍhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśād aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upalabhyopoṣitau /
XXavsata_u:6730: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kṛkeḥ putratvam abhyupagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:6735: tasyopari divase divase saptakṛtvaḥ taptavālukā nipatati yayā so 'sthiśeṣaḥ kriyate /
XXavsata_u:6737: kasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ kasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalavipāko yenāham īdṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhavāmīti /
XXavsata_u:6738: sa paśyati: aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ me upavāsaṃ samādāya śikṣāśaithilyaṃ kṛtaṃ yenāham īdṛśaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
XXavsata_u:6739: yena punaḥ samādāya rakṣitaṃ tena rājyaṃ pratilabdham iti /
XXavsata_u:6744: apy eva nāma nāgayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:6745: tato nāgavarṇam antardhāpya brāhmaṇavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6752: tato rājā bhītas trastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo hiraṇyapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:6758: atra me stambhe pitā asakṛdgandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtavān* /
XXavsata_u:6764: saha pañca copāsakaśikṣāpadāni saptatriṃśac ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6765: tato rājñā tasya nāgasyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upavāso likhitvā dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6766: ṛṣipatananivāsibhiś ca dvādaśabhir ṛṣisahasraiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ pratyakṣīkṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6767: sa ca nāgo 'ṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upoṣya sthalam udgamyotsṛṣṭakāyo 'vasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6768: so 'nāhāratāṃ pratipaṇṇaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā pañcaśataparivāraḥ praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /

XXavsata_u:6784: bhagavān api tebhya ālopam anuprayacchanti mahāśrāvakāś ca /
XXavsata_u:6787: yadā bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:6788: tadā te haṃsā bhagavatsakāśaṃ gatvā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /

XXavsata_u:6852: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:6854: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:6855: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:6856: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:6857: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇaṃ jāmbūnadaniṣkasadṛśaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6858: suvarṇavarṇayā cānena prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam* /
XXavsata_u:6859: taddarśanān mātāpitarāv anye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6862: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:6865: yasmād anena jātena suvarṇavarṇayā prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam*,
XXavsata_u:6866: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya suvarṇābha iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:6867: suvarṇābho dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:6868: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:6870: sa ca paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ //
XXavsata_u:6871: yāvad apareṇa samayena rūpamadamatto bahir adhiṣṭhānasya krīḍati /
XXavsata_u:6873: tatas tena suvarṇābhena dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca:
XXavsata_u:6875: tair uktam*: nyagrodhārāmaṃ gacchāmo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ draṣṭum iti /
XXavsata_u:6876: suvarṇābhasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ nāma śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭani,
XXavsata_u:6879: yanv aham api buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:6881_0: tatas tatra dadarśa suvarṇābhakumāro buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
XXavsata_u:6881_1: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ
XXavsata_u:6885: sa bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:6887: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6889: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:6890: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:6892: tato bhagavān gajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasārya suvarṇābhadārakam idam avocat*: ehi kumāra,

XXavsata_u:6913: AVŚ_61.2 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /

XXavsata_u:7529: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:7531: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:7532: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:7533: yadāsau kumāro jātas tadā devatābhir divyāḥ patākāḥ samantata ucchrāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:7536: sarvaṃ ca kapilavastu nagaraṃ yaśasā āpūritam*,
XXavsata_u:7538: tasya jatau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:7543: āpūritaḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viditayaśā iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:7544: viditayaśā dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:7545: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:7547: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7549_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:7551: prasādajātaś ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:7552: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,

XXavsata_u:7554: sa dṛṣṭasatyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānapradānāni datvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /

XXavsata_u:7565: viditayaśasaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:7568: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:7572: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:

XXavsata_u:7577: bhagavān* / sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati /

XXavsata_u:7582: tatra ca stūpamahe vartamāne mallānāṃ madhye patākā ucchrāpitā /
XXavsata_u:7585: sa tām ādāya anekaprāṇiśatasahasraparivṛto nānāvicitrair vādyair vādyamānair yena vipaśyinaḥ stūpas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7586: upasaṃkramya tathāgataguṇānām anusmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tāṃ patākāṃ stūpayaṣṭyāṃ baddhvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān*:
XXavsata_u:7587: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:7588: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:7590: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena malla āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:7592: yad anena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ sukham anubhūtavān* /

XXavsata_u:7597: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,

XXavsata_u:7627: sā dārikā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā ātmahitaparahitapratipannā /
XXavsata_u:7629: tebhyas tebhyaḥ kaṇṭhād alaṃkāram avamucya prayacchati /
XXavsata_u:7631: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:7634: tair upadrūyamāṇaḥ pitā cāsyāḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:7637: yāvad asau dārikā pitaraṃ cintāparam avekṣyovāca:
XXavsata_u:7642: svayam evāhaṃ saptame divase svayaṃvaram avatariṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:7643: tataḥ śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:7644: saptame divase suprabhā dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati,
XXavsata_u:7645: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti //
XXavsata_u:7647: tataḥ saptame divase suprabhā dārikā rathābhirūḍhā kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrapaṭe lekhayitvā abhiṣṭuvatī vīthīm avatīrṇā /

XXavsata_u:7649: sarvathāhaṃ na kenacid aṃśena bhavatāṃ paribhavaṃ karomi /
XXavsata_u:7654: suprabhāpi dārikā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /

XXavsata_u:7656: yāṃ śrutvā suprabhayā dārikayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:7658: atha suprabhā dārikā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:7659: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:7667: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā jetavanān nirgatya tatrāgatā /
XXavsata_u:7671: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā tair upakramyamāṇā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśayitum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:7673: tatas te tad atyadbhūtaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā uddaṇḍaromāṇo mūlanikṛtta iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:7676: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān paribhuñjīthā iti /

XXavsata_u:9328: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,

XXavsata_u:9333: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena bhikṣur āsīt, ayaṃ saḥ /

XXavsata_u:9349_4: varṣā upagataḥ pāṇḍukambalaśilāyāṃ pārijātasya kovidārasya nātidūre /
XXavsata_u:9352: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ śrāvastyāṃ varṣā upagato jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /

XXavsata_u:9357: atha catasraḥ parṣada utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyam idam avocat*:

XXavsata_u:9561: yasmād asya janmani kapilavastu nagaraṃ samantataḥ śobhitam*,
XXavsata_u:9562: tasmād asya bhavatu śobhita iti nāmeti /

XXavsata_u:9567_1: virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ

XXavsata_u:9620: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deydharmaparityāgena ca abhirūpaḥ syāṃ darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ,

XXavsata_u:9643: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /

XXavsata_u:9649: yasminn eva divase kapphiṇaḥ kumāro jātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9650: tasminn eva divase aṣṭādaśānām amātyasahasrāṇāṃ putrā jātāḥ,
XXavsata_u:9656: athāpareṇa samayena rājā mahākapphiṇo 'ṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛto mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:9657: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:9658: asti bhavantaḥ kasyacid evaṃrūpo balaughaḥ tadyathā mamaivaitarhīti?
XXavsata_u:9667: deva kecid deśā gaṇādhīnāḥ kecid rājādhīnā iti /
XXavsata_u:9668: yāvad rājñā mahākapphiṇena śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:9672: etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ saṃgamya samāgamya ekasamūhena śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9674: taiḥ sa vṛttānto bhagavato vistareṇa niveditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9676: uktāś ca: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti /
XXavsata_u:9680: tato bhagavatā dūtāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayam nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:9687: saptatālodgataṃ ca simḥāsanaṃ yatra bhagavān niṣaṇṇāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9688: tato dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9689: tato bhagavatā lekhaṃ lekhayitvā sa dūto 'bhihitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:9696: aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:9697: tato dūtena gatvā rājño mahākapphiṇasya lekhaṃ vācikaṃ ca yat saṃdiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ niveditam* //
XXavsata_u:9698: tataḥ kapphiṇo rājā aṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivṛto 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9699: prātisīmāś ca rājāno rājānaṃ mahākapphiṇaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9702: tato bhagavatā tasyāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:9709: saptatālodgataṃ ca siṃhāsanaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva nirmitam* /
XXavsata_u:9716: aho bata śakro devendra aindraṃ dhanur ādāya āgacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:9717: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ sārathiveṣeṇa aindraṃ dhanur upanāmayati /

XXavsata_u:9726: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //

XXavsata_u:9854: tataḥ sarvaśākyeṣu saṃnipatiteṣu rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati:

XXavsata_u:9909: asau bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛto lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā devamanuṣyāvarjanakareṇātipraśānteneryāpathena piṇḍapātam ādāya caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgataḥ /

XXavsata_u:10113: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:10115: tena prasādajātena bhagavān kāśyapaḥ saparivāra upasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10117: parinirvṛtasya ca stūpe kanīyāñ chatram āropitavān* /
XXavsata_u:10119: ayam evāsau rāṣṭrapālas tena kālena tena samayena /
XXavsata_u:10120: aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:10121: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamo mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10123: tena tatra paryaṭatā vanānte glānaḥ pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10128: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:10129: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10131: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre na kadācid duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:10132: idānīm apy āḍhye rājakule pratyājāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10134: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10137: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:10141: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:10145: subhūtiḥ sthaviraś cāpi hasta lekuñcikas tathā /
XXavsata_u:10146: saṃsāro guptikaś cāpi virūpo gaṅgikena ca /
XXavsata_u:10147: dīrghanakhaḥ saṃgītiś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:10150_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:10150_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:10151: yadā bhagavatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya śrāvakā niyuktās teṣu janapadeṣu vineyajanānugrahārtham*,
XXavsata_u:10152: tadā ye 'dhyāyinas te sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāṃ dhyānaparā sthitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:10154: sa taṃ sumerupariṣaṇḍāyām āropya bhakṣayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10155: tato nāgapotalako jīvitād vyaparopyamāṇo mahāśrāvakāṇām antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ //
XXavsata_u:10156: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā śrāvastyāṃ bhūtir nāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10158: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:10160: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:10164: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhūtir iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:10165: subhūtir dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān samvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10166: sa pūrveṇa hetubalādhānena atīva roṣaṇaḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahulo mātāpitṛbhyām ātharvaṇād vinivartya ṛṣiṣu pravrājitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10167: sa ca tatra dhyānaparaḥ saṃyato 'nyatarad vanaṣaṇḍam upaniśritya viharati /
XXavsata_u:10168: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe devatā prativasati dṛṣṭasatyā /
XXavsata_u:10171: yanv aham enaṃ bhagavaddarśane niyojayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:10172: tatas tayā devatayā subhūteḥ purastād buddhasya varṇo bhāṣito dharmasya ca saṃghasya ca /
XXavsata_u:10177_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:10181: tataḥ prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:10182: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:10183: yāṃ śrutvā subhūtinā kulaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10185: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena maitrībhāvanayā cittaṃ damayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10186: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10187: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:10191: paśyati: pañca jātiśatāni nāgebhyaś cyuto nāgeṣv evopapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10196: idānīṃ punas tathā kariṣyāmi yat pareṣām antike dveṣopasaṃbhāro notpatsyate /
XXavsata_u:10197: yena samanvāgataḥ kāyasya bhedād apāyaṃ durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
XXavsata_u:10199: yadā saṃghe vā grāme vā deśe vā janapade vā bhikṣāhetor vihartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:10201: mā māṃ kaścit kāraṇena dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ pradūṣayiṣyati,
XXavsata_u:10207: yanv aham idānīṃ mahājanānugrahārthaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:10208: tatas tena ṛddhyā pañca suparṇiśatāni nirmitāni,
XXavsata_u:10209: yāni dṛṣṭvā nāgā bhītās trastā saṃvignā itaś cāmutaś ca saṃbhrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:10212: punar api mahāntaṃ nāgarūpam abhinirmāya pañca garuḍaśatāny abhidrutāni /
XXavsata_u:10214: evaṃ tena nāgānāṃ garuḍānāṃ ca pañca kulaśatāni vinītāni /
XXavsata_u:10216: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇām araṇāvihāriṇāṃ yaduta subhūtiḥ kulaputraḥ //
XXavsata_u:10217: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:10218: kāni bhadanta subhūtinā karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāraṇāvihāriṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti /
XXavsata_u:10220: subhūtinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:10223: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau,
XXavsata_u:10227: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:10228: AVŚ_91.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:10229: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:10230_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
XXavsata_u:10230_1: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
XXavsata_u:10230_2: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:10231: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:10236: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:10237: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:10238: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajya araṇāvihāriṇām agraḥ syām iti //
XXavsata_u:10240: aprahīṇatvāt kleśānām udbhrāntatvād indriyāṇām aparyantīkṛtatvāt karmapathānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣabhikṣuṣu cittaṃ pradūṣya āśīviṣavādena samudācaritāḥ,
XXavsata_u:10246: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10249: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:10253: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:10256_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:10256_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:10257: anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:10259: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:10260: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:10262: yāvad bhūyas tayaiva sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:10263: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10264: sa prathamagarbho yathāvasthitaḥ eva mātur udare /
XXavsata_u:10272: yadā cāsyā maraṇāntikī vedanā prādurbhūtā nacireṇa kālaṃ kariṣyatīti,
XXavsata_u:10274: yat khalv āryaputra jānīyāḥ mamātra prathamagarbho 'vatiṣṭhate /
XXavsata_u:10276: tadā dakṣiṇapārśvaṃ śastreṇa ghātayitvā tataḥ prathamasthitaṃ dārakam uddharethāḥ / ity uktvā:
XXavsata_u:10277: AVŚ_92.1 sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ /
XXavsata_u:10280: tasyāḥ kālagatāyā nīlapītalohitāvadātair vastraiḥ śibikām (Speyer: śivikām)
XXavsata_u:10281: alaṃkṛtya śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nītvā jīvako (Speyer: jīviko)
XXavsata_u:10283: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:10284: evam amukastriyā iyanti varṣāṇi garbhaḥ sthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10286: na cāsau prathamataram avasthito garbho nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:10287: adya jīvako vaidyarājaḥ śastreṇa mṛtāyā udaraṃ ghātayitvā taṃ prathamasthitaṃ dārakam uddhariṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:10288: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kutūhalād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi śītavanaśmaśāne saṃnipatitāni /
XXavsata_u:10296: yāvad bhagavān ājñātakauṇḍinyabāṣpamahānāmāniruddhaśāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapānandarevataprabhṛtibhir mahāśrāvakaiḥ parivṛtaḥ śītavanaśmaśānaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:10297: janakāyena ca bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vivaraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10298: tatra jīvakena tasyāḥ striyā dakṣiṇaḥ kukṣiḥ pāṭitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10299: tataḥ svayam eva nirgato valipalitacitāṅgaḥ parijīrṇaśarīrāvayavaḥ:
XXavsata_u:10301: nirgatamātraś ca taṃ janakāyam avalokya vācaṃ niścārayati sma:
XXavsata_u:10302: mā bhavanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu kharāṃ vācaṃ niścārayata /
XXavsata_u:10304: yad aham āmāśayapakvāśayayor madhye ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇy uṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10316: tato bhagavatā tadadhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:10317: yāṃ śrutvā saṃvignair bahubhiḥ satvaśatair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ //
XXavsata_u:10318: sa ca daśavarṣāṇi gṛhāgāram adhyāsya saptativarṣo bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10319: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pañcaviṃśatyā bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ varṣā upagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:10322: trayāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāc caturviṃśatyā bhikṣubhir arhatvaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:10324: tataḥ saṃghasthavireṇa pravāraṇāyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ subahu paribhāṣya gaṇamadhyān niṣkāsitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10325: sa śastram ādāya kuṭiṃ praviśya rudan bahuvidhaṃ paridevate / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:10327: AVŚ_92.2 ādīptaṃ kānanaṃ sarvaṃ parvatā pi palīkṛtā /
XXavsata_u:10328: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate //
XXavsata_u:10330: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate //
