XXavsata_u:10332: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate //
XXavsata_u:10333: AVŚ_92.5 pāṇḍupatraṃ vanaṃ hy etacchīṛnapatro vanaspatiḥ /
XXavsata_u:10334: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate //
XXavsata_u:10335: AVŚ_92.6 śastram ārādhayiṣyāmi ko nv artho jīvitena me /
XXavsata_u:10336: kathaṃ pṛthagjano bhūtvā śāstāram upasaṃkrame // iti
XXavsata_u:10337: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:10338_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānām ekārakṣāṇām
XXavsata_u:10338_5: trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:10339: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10341: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:10344: AVŚ_92.7 apy evātikramed velāṃ sāgaro makarālayaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10345: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:10346: yāvad bhagavatā samanvāhṛtyā copasaṃkramya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:10347_0: yāṃ śrutvā sthavirakeṇa idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ
XXavsata_u:10348: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10349: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:10353: paśyati pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni kālikāvātavitrāsitāni apāyād vyasanābhimukhāni,
XXavsata_u:10356: tataḥ sthavireṇa ṛddhyā gatvā tasmād bhayāt paritrātāḥ /
XXavsata_u:10359: taiḥ sarvair eva yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10360: teṣāṃ ca guṇeṣu na kaścit pratyakṣaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10366: tata āyuṣmān ānandaḥ sabrahmacārivatsalaḥ parānugrahapravṛtta āyuṣmantaṃ sthavirakanāmān udbhāvayitukāmo yenāyuṣmān sthaviranāmā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10367: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmatā sthavireṇa sthaviranāmnā bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10368: ekānte niṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān ānandaḥ sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāman idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:10369: pṛcchema vayam āyuṣmantaṃ sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāmānaṃ kaṃcid eva pradeśam*,
XXavsata_u:10373: araṇyagatenāyuṣman sthavira bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena katame dharmā abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyāḥ?
XXavsata_u:10374: āha: araṇyagatena āyuṣmann ānanda bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena dvau dharmāv abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyau:
XXavsata_u:10377: sthavira āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
XXavsata_u:10378: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
XXavsata_u:10379: śamatha āyuṣmann ānanda āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto vipaśyanām āgamya vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:10380: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā śamatham āgamya vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:10381: śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitam āyuṣmann ānanda śrutavataḥ āryaśrāvakasya cittaṃ dhātuśo vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:10386: kasya nu sthavira prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate?

XXavsata_u:10987: tena anācāryakeṇa saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvā pratyekā bodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā /
XXavsata_u:10989: bahv anena śreṣṭhinā matsaṃtāpād apuṇyaṃ prasūtam* /
XXavsata_u:10990: yanv aham enaṃ gatvā saṃvejayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:10991: tatas tasyāgrato gatvā upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10993: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ vijñāpayati: avatara,
XXavsata_u:10998: tenāsau pratyekabuddhaḥ kṣamāpayitvā piṇḍakena pratipādya paṭenācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11006: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhī āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:11008: tasya karmaṇaḥ prabhāvāt pañca janmaśatāni kaśābhis tāḍyamānaḥ kālaṃ kṛtavān* /
XXavsata_u:11009: tenaiva hetunā ayam evaṃvidhaṃ āśraya āsāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11010: bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati sahajātakair vayasyakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pravrajita āsīt*/
XXavsata_u:11013: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11016: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,

XXavsata_u:11025: # # # anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /

XXavsata_u:11029: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /

XXavsata_u:11038: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya virūpa iti nāma //
XXavsata_u:11039: ydā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā tasya lajjayā mahān saṃkoco jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11044: sa bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā jehrīyamāṇa itaś cāmutaś ca palāyitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11045: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathādhiṣṭhito yan na śaknoti palāyitum* /
XXavsata_u:11046: tato bhagavān saha śrāvakair nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11047: tato nirodhād vyutthāya virūpam ātmānaṃ nirmitavān* /
XXavsata_u:11048: nirmāya śarāvaṃ bhojanapūrṇam ādāya virūpam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣajāta āmantritavān*:
XXavsata_u:11056: tato virūpo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
XXavsata_u:11066: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:11071: virūpeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:11075: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:11079: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:11080: AVŚ_97.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:11081: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:11082: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani puṣyo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:11085: paśyati tasmin kāle dvau bodhisatvau saṃnikṛṣṭau:
XXavsata_u:11091: atha puṣyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvasya saṃtatiparipācanārthaṃ himavantaṃ parvatam abhiruhya ratnaguhāṃ praviśa paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā tejodhātuṃ samāpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11092: tasmiṃś ca kāle śākyamunir bodhisatvaḥ phalamūlānām arthe himavantaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11093_0: sa itas tataś cañcūryamāṇo dadarśa puṣyaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃṣatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
XXavsata_u:11093_1: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ
XXavsata_u:11095: yad ekapādena sapta rātriṃdivāni ekayā gāthayā stutavān*:
XXavsata_u:11096: AVŚ_97.2 na divi bhuvi vā nāsmiṃl loke na vaiśravaṇālaye
XXavsata_u:11097: na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā /
XXavsata_u:11100: atha puṣyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ paripakvasaṃtatiṃ śākyamuniṃ bodhisatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhukāram adāt*:
XXavsata_u:11104: tato bhagavān maheśākhyābhir devatābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11105: tatra guhānivāsinī devatā alpeśākhyatvān na śaknoti tāṃ guhāṃ samabhiroḍhum* /
XXavsata_u:11107: yadā suciram api bhīṣayamāṇā na śaknoti bhagavato 'pakāraṃ kartum*,
XXavsata_u:11110: tataḥ sā udāraṃ rūpam abhinirmāya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayitvā piṇḍakena pratipāditavatī //

XXavsata_u:11115: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:11116: idānīm api tenaiva hetunā virūpaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /

XXavsata_u:11133: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:11134: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:11135: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:11138: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:11141: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
XXavsata_u:11143: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:11144: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:11146: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11147: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:11152: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:11154: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11155: pañcāveṇikā dharmā ekatye paṇḍitajātīye mātṛgrāme / katame
XXavsata_u:11157: pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti viraktaṃ {puruṣaṃ} jānāti /
XXavsata_u:11169: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
XXavsata_u:11180: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā mama nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
XXavsata_u:11181: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:11182: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati,
XXavsata_u:11183_0: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
XXavsata_u:11184: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:11185: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:11186: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:11188: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā gaṅgika iti nāma kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:11189: gaṅgiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:11190: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:11192: sa ca nirbhedabhāgīyaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhāvāse nābhiramate /
XXavsata_u:11196: tato 'sya mātāpitarāv ekaputraka iti kṛtvā nānujānītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11201: ko me upāyo bhaved yad ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane pravrajeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:11203: yanv ahaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā ātmānamātmanā jīvitād vyaparopayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:11204: yathā manuṣyātvam āsādya laghu laghv eva pravrajeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:11212: kaḥ upāyaḥ syād yena kālaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:11214: sarvathāyaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ sāhasikaś ca /
XXavsata_u:11215: yanv aham asya gṛhe rātrau saṃdhiṃ chindyām iti /
XXavsata_u:11216: sa rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā rātrau saṃprāptāyāṃ bhagne cakṣuṣpathe saṃdhim ārabdhaś chettum* /
XXavsata_u:11217: tato rakṣibhir jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'jātaśatror upanītaḥ:
XXavsata_u:11221: tato rājñā aparādhika iti kṛtvā vadhya utsṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11222_1: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śrāvaṇāmukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa niṣkāsya
XXavsata_u:11225: mā kadācid rājñaś cittasyānyathātvaṃ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:11226: tato vyadhyaghātair eṣā pravṛttī rājño niveditā /
XXavsata_u:11228: ko hetur yat tvam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktum icchasīti /
XXavsata_u:11229: tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa rājñe samākhyātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11230: tato rājā ajātaśatruḥ kadambapuṣpavad āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho rudan mukha udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:11234: yatra nāmāyaṃ pravrajyāhetor idam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktuṃ vyavasitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11239_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:11240: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11241: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //

XXavsata_u:11260: AVŚ_98.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:11261: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:11262: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śmaśānamoṣako mātaṅgaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11263: yāvat tena pāthān hatvā bhāṇḍam āsāditam* /
XXavsata_u:11265: yāvad anyatamasmin śmaśāne pratyekabudho nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11268: mātaṅgas tasya purastād bhāṇḍam apasṛjya tatraiva nilīnaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11269: tats te taskarāḥ pratyekabuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā asyārabdhāḥ kṣeptuṃ śastram agniṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:11270: na cāsya cīvarakarṇakam api śaknuvanti cālayitum*,
XXavsata_u:11274: tatas tena śmaśānamoṣakeṇa mātaṅgena taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:11275: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:11277: evam aham api yatra yatra jāyeya,

XXavsata_u:11299: tena śārī nāma dārikā māṭharasakāśāl labdhā /
XXavsata_u:11301: tadā bhrātrā saha dīrghanakhena vivādaṃ kurvantī nigrahasthānaṃ prāpayati /
XXavsata_u:11303: tato dīrghanakhena dakṣiṇāpathaṃ gatvā bahūni śāstrāṇy adhītāni /
XXavsata_u:11315: tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:11316: śāriputro 'pi bhagavataḥ purastāt sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavanataṃ vījayan* /
XXavsata_u:11317: atha dadarśa dīrghanakhaparivrājako bhagavantam ardhacandrākāreṇopaviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam*,
XXavsata_u:11319: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:11320: sarvaṃ me bho gautama na kṣamata iti /
XXavsata_u:11322: eṣāpi te agnivaiśyāyana dṛṣṭir na kṣamate,
XXavsata_u:11325: eṣāpi me bho gautama dṛṣṭir na kṣamate,
XXavsata_u:11328: api tu te agnivaiśyāyana evaṃ jānato 'yāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ;
XXavsata_u:11329: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ?
XXavsata_u:11330: api me bho gautama evaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyato 'syāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11338: punar aparam ihaika evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī:
XXavsata_u:11340: punar aparam eka evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī:
XXavsata_u:11343: tatrāgnivaiśyāyana yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti,
XXavsata_u:11353: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate na saṃrāgāya,
XXavsata_u:11365: tat saṃrāgāya saṃdveṣāya saṃmohāya saṃyogāya saṃkleśāya,
XXavsata_u:11379: dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11383: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti /
XXavsata_u:11386: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann
XXavsata_u:11390: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11391: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ //
XXavsata_u:11400: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti /
XXavsata_u:11403: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
XXavsata_u:11405: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11406: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ //
XXavsata_u:11415: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamate iti /
XXavsata_u:11418: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
XXavsata_u:11420: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11421: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ //]
XXavsata_u:11434: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
XXavsata_u:11436: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11437: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ //
XXavsata_u:11438: ayaṃ khalv agnivaiśyāyana kāyo rūpī audārikaś cāturmahābhūtika iti āryaśrāvakeṇa abhīkṣṇam udayavyayānudarśinā vihartavyam*,
XXavsata_u:11441: yo 'sya bhavati kāye kāyacchandaḥ kāyasnehaḥ kāyapremā kāyālayaḥ kāyaviṣaktiḥ kāyādhyavasānam*,
XXavsata_u:11442: tac cāsya cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati //
XXavsata_u:11446: yasmin samaye śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:11447: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ:
XXavsata_u:11449: sukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:11451: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:11452: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
XXavsata_u:11454: duḥkhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:11456: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:11457: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
XXavsata_u:11459: aduḥkhāsukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:11462: imā vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhāvā iti?
XXavsata_u:11463: imā vedanā sparśanidānāḥ sparśasamudayāḥ sparśajātīyāḥ sparśaprabhāvāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11464: tasya sparśasya samudayāt tās tā vedanāḥ samudayante
XXavsata_u:11466: tasya sparśasya nirodhāt tās tā vedanā nirudhyante,
XXavsata_u:11468: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate sukhāṃ vā duḥkhāṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhā vā,
XXavsata_u:11469: tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmīti,
XXavsata_u:11470: tasya vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānata utpannāsu vedanāsv anityatānudarśī viharati,
XXavsata_u:11472: sa kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXavsata_u:11473: jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamāno jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXavsata_u:11474: bhedāc ca kāyasyorddhvaṃ jīvitaparyādānād ihaivāsya sarvāṇi vedanāni apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante apariśeṣam astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
XXavsata_u:11476: sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:11479: aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:11484: duḥkhām api aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:11491: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmāñ śāriputro 'rdhamāsopasaṃpanno bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ vījayan* /
XXavsata_u:11493: bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam eva varṇayati,
XXavsata_u:11494: virāgam eva nirodham eva pratiniḥsargam eva varṇayati /
XXavsata_u:11495: yanv ahaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇānudarśī vihareyam*,
XXavsata_u:11498_0: āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaiṣāṃ dharmāṇām anityatānudarśino viharato vyayānudarśino virāgānudarśino
XXavsata_u:11498_1: nirodhānudarśinaḥ pratiniḥsargānudarśino viharataḥ anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam* /
XXavsata_u:11499: dīrghanakhasya ca parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* //
XXavsata_u:11500: atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:11502: dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat /
XXavsata_u:11503: lābheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:11505: labdhavān dīrghanakhaparivrājakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:11506: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:11507: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
XXavsata_u:11510: dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā pratipadya pravedayate:
XXavsata_u:11513: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
XXavsata_u:11514: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11516: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisaṃvitprāptānāṃ yaduta koṣṭhilo bhikṣur iti //
XXavsata_u:11517: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:11518: kāni bhadanta mahākoṣṭhilena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:11522: koṣṭhilenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:11525: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:11529: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:11530: AVŚ_99.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:11531: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:11532: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ pañcamātrāṇi taskaraśatāni senāpatipramukhāṇi cauryeṇa saṃprasthitāni /
XXavsata_u:11533: yāvat te cañcūryamāṇā anyatamaṃ khadiravaṇam anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11535: paśyata yūyaṃ kamalāyatākṣaḥ kaścid aparakīyo manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
XXavsata_u:11538: tatas tais taskaraiḥ paryaṭadbhir dṛṣṭvā senāpatisakāśaṃ nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11539: tataś caurasenāpatinā vadhyatām ayam ity ājñā dattā /
XXavsata_u:11540: tato 'sau pratyekabuddhas teṣām anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ khagapatham abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11541: tataḥ senāpatir mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* /
XXavsata_u:11543: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:11544: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:11546: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena caurasenāpatiḥ,
XXavsata_u:11551: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11554: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:11558: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:11563_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:11563_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:11564: atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
XXavsata_u:11565: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya āntareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* /
XXavsata_u:11566: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:11567: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11568: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt* /
XXavsata_u:11569: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:11570: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11572: upasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pādaṃ pādenopadhāya ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvann iti //
XXavsata_u:11573: tatra bhagavān rātryā madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11574: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt* ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11576: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati ubhau yamakaśālavanasya drumottamau tathāgatasya siṃhaśayyāṃ śālapuṣpair avākiratām* /
XXavsata_u:11577: samanantaraparinirvṛte bhagavati anyataro bhikṣus tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11578: AVŚ_100.1 sundarau khalv imau śālavanasyāsya drumottamau /
XXavsata_u:11580: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati śakro devendro gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11582: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham* // iti
XXavsata_u:11583: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati brahmā sahāṃpatir gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11588: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān āniruddho gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11595: pradyotasy eva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣas tasya cetasaḥ //
XXavsata_u:11596: saptāhaparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataś citāṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvan* gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11597: AVŚ_100.7 yena kāyaratanena nāyako brahmalokam agaman maharddhikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11598: dahyate sma tanujena tejasā pañcabhir yugaśataiḥ sa veṣṭitaḥ (Speyer: veṣṭhitaḥ) //
XXavsata_u:11599: AVŚ_100.8 sahasramātreṇa hi cīvarāṇāṃ buddhasya kāyaḥ pariveṣṭito 'bhūt* /
XXavsata_u:11601: dve cīvare tatra tu naiva dagdhe abhyantaraṃ bāhyam atha dvitīyam* //
XXavsata_u:11602_0: varṣaśataparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati pāṭaliputre nagare rājā aśoko rājyaṃ kārayati
XXavsata_u:11602_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:11604: yāvad apareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:11605: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:11606: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:11607: dārako jāto abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ kuṇālasadṛśābhyāṃ netrābhyām* /
XXavsata_u:11608: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:11612: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kuṇāla iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:11613: kuṇālo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:11614: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:11616: tatas taṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ rājā utsaṅgena kṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ prekṣya rūpasaṃpadā praharṣita uvāca:
XXavsata_u:11618: tatra ca samaye gāndhāre puṣpabherotso nāma grāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11619: tatrānyatamasya gṛhapateḥ putro jāto 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:11623: puṣpasaṃpannaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:11624: yatra yatra kumāro gacchati tatra tatra ca puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:11627: tato 'pareṇa samayena puṣpabherotsād vaṇijaḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena pāṭaliputraṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11628: te prābhṛtam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upagatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11629: tataḥ pādayor nipatya prābhṛtaṃ rājñe upanamayya purastād vyavasthitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11630: tato rājā aśokas teṣāṃ kuṇālaṃ darśayati:
XXavsata_u:11632: kadācit kutracid bhavadbhiḥ paryaṭadbhir evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaviśeṣayuktaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam iti ?
XXavsata_u:11633: tatas te vaṇijaḥ kṛtakarapuṭāḥ pādayor nipatya abhayaṃ mārgayitvā rājānam ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:11634: asti deva asmadīye viṣaye sundaro nāma kumāro 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:11635: janmani cāsya divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:11637: yatra yatra ca kumāro gacchati tatra tatra puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:11638: śrutvā rājā aśokaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11640: eṣa rājā aśoka āgantum icchati sundarasya kumārasya darśanahetoḥ /
XXavsata_u:11641: yad vaḥ kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kurudhvam iti /
XXavsata_u:11645: tataḥ sa kumāro bhadrayānaṃ yojayitvā śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ prābhṛtasyārthe datvā aśokasya sakāśaṃ preṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11647: śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'śokasya sakāśam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11648: rājā aśokaś ca sahadarśanāt sundarasya kumārasya rūpaṃ śobhāṃ varṇapuṣkalatāṃ ca divyāṃ puṣkariṇīm udyānaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ //
XXavsata_u:11649: tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviropaguptasya vismayajananārthaṃ sundaraṃ ca kumāram ādāya kukkuṭāgāraṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:11652: tataḥ sa sthavirasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:11654: tataḥ kumāraḥ paripakvasaṃtatir dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11655: sa rājānam aśokam anujñāpya sthaviropaguptasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11656_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:11657: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11658: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:11659: tato rājā aśokaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ sthaviraṃ pṛcchati:
XXavsata_u:11662: kāni punaḥ karmāṇi yena divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:11667: mahārāja pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:11670: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:11674: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:11675: AVŚ_100.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:11676: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:11678: tadā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ pañcaśataparivāro magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran dharmasaṃgītiṃ kartukāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11679: yāvad anyatamena daridrakarṣakeṇa mahān bhikṣusaṃgho dṛṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11682: tatas tena kāśyapapramukhāṇi pañca bhikṣuśatāni jentākasnātreṇopanimantritāni /
XXavsata_u:11683: tatas tena nānāgandhaparibhāvitam uṣṇodakaṃ kṛtvā te bhikṣavaḥ snāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:11685: praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpya śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni datvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:11686: asminn eva śākyamuneḥ pravacane pravrajya cārhatvaṃ prāpnuyām iti //
XXavsata_u:11687: kiṃ manyase mahārāja yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena daridrakarṣakaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11691: divyacandanodakaparipūrṇā ramaṇīyā puṣkariṇī puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:11694: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11697: tasmāt tarhi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:11700: atha rāhā aśoka āyuṣmataḥ sthaviropaguptasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
